Title: Clarifies what buildings constitute an existing public school building for purposes of the location of charter schools
Summary: Clarifies what buildings constitute an existing public school building for purposes of the location of charter schools by describing an existing public school building as being a building that is currently occupied or is unoccupied but designated for potential school use.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to clarifying what buildings constitute an existing public school building for purposes of the location of charter schools
